Gefangen in der Realität

June 2011, Dom im Berg, Schlossberg raz

Based on "Die Fledermaus" by Johann Strauss

Winner of the Ring Award Off 2011

Director: Morten K. Roesen/

Set design: Nikolaus Webern / Costume design: Carla Caminati / Music Remix: Michael Ho

Singers: Rosalinde - Cornelia Hübsch, Adele - Avelyn Francis, Orlofsky - Antonija Fabijanovic, Eisenstein - Robert Bartneck, Alfred - Milko Elek, Dr. Falke - Georg Klimbacher

Site specific opera production for the Copenhagen Opera Festival. "The lost souls of Trekroner." It takes place on the old military fortress Trekroner in the Copenhagen habour. The audience is invited on a journey of discovery into the dark mind where restless souls, insane delusions and hellish torments lurk. A devilish pact surrounds the characters on the island of Trekroner – but can the audience penetrate the darkness to solve the mysteries of the island or are the souls forever lost?
